Package Stt1xX.Production.Receivers

Class Manager

java.lang.Object
Receivers.Product.Manager
Direct Known Subclasses:
CollectionManager, FileManager, ProgramManager, ReceiverStorage
public abstract class Manager extends Object
first of all I want to say that I decided to separate the "Receivers" into FileManager, ProgramManager, ReceiverStorage, CollectionManager. I did it for encapsulation.

ReceiverStorage is an unusual manager - it stores collections of all receivers, contains a collection of Movies, also a collection of all program commands

Author:
Stt1xX
